entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister of Magic who has come to keep an eye on Harry Potter. He is described as wanting to punish Harry for his actions and is concerned about losing him again.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a wizard who has been involved in underage magic. Fudge has come to keep an eye on him and wants him to stay within Diagon Alley.

entities.name: tom the innkeeper
entities.description: Tom is the innkeeper of the Leaky Cauldron who is accompanying Fudge in keeping an eye on Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Fudge has come to keep an eye on Harry Potter and wants him to stay within Diagon Alley.
Fudge is accompanied by Tom the innkeeper in keeping an eye on Harry Potter.
